Name: Snood Murdekin
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT cream over drink.
Review: Moreish combination of coffee and raspberries topped with cream.
History: Created in the late 90s by Dick Bradsell at Detroit, London, England for Karin Wiklund and named for the sad, flute-playing Moomin Troll character from the Moomin books by Tove Jansson.
Nutrition: One serving of Snood Murdekin contains 143 calories
